medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began 3 days ago, mostly in the upper abdomen/epigastric area. Patient reports recent flatulence with diffuse abdominal discomfort and bloating. Significant unintentional weight loss over the past year with ongoing loss of appetite. Today, patient felt unsteady on feet with dizziness on standing. Patient endorses fevers and chills, denies nausea or vomiting, and hasn't had a bowel movement in 4 days.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of T2DM, CAD s/p CABG, hyphenated conditions include hypertension, dyslipidemia, peripheral arterial disease, bilateral carotid artery stenosis, and colon cancer s/p hemicolectomy with adjuvant chemotherapy.
